content: heart warmer is a cowl fit for a baby toddler or child it fits snugly under a jacket or sweater to keep the neck and top of the torso chill free perfect for spring or autumn keeping out cold winds without adding an additional layer the cowl is knit in the round from the top down and uses short row shaping to make high neck back and a low front bib **this pattern has been translated into polish by truscaveczka 1 and is available for download here 2 ** schemat został przetłumaczony przez truscaveczkę 3 na język polski i znajduje się na jej blogu 4 1 http //www ravelry com/people/truscaveczka 2 http //trustrans blogspot co uk/2014/01/heartwarmer-by-dani-sunshine html 3 http //www ravelry com/people/truscaveczka 4 http //trustrans blogspot co uk/2014/01/heartwarmer-by-dani-sunshine html
